Blood Products
For urgent requests contact TM immediately. Emergency supply red blood cells (unmatched O negative) available
Group and Screen required

1. Recommended dose is 10 to 15 mL/kg. Maximum dose is 20 mL/kg 2. For children greater than 25 kg use adult dosing, 1 unit RBC 3. Maximum rate 5 mL/kg/h to a maximum hourly rate of 150 mL/h, for non emergency situations
Blood Product Fact Sheet
Special requirements (e.g. Irradiated) must be identified for red blood cell transfusion orders
Consult with TM required. Consultation with Neonatologist or Pediatrician strongly recommended
Order in mL. If total volume is 300 mL or greater consider ordering in units. (1 adult unit equals approximately 300 mL)
